text: Howdy - how are things going on the code review? Any initial questions worth bubbling up to Joey and the LB crew? Let me know!
Evans and I had a discussion this morning on the topic. There are a lot of unknowns related to the user experience. So we are meeting at 3 to write up all our questions.
perfect! Just making sure we’re on track. Holler w/ any questions
checking in on the questions
just for clarity, what we saw was ONE ble module type
not proximity w/ ble or accelerometer w/ BLE

ie 
>	Q1: Does the BLE module have knowledge of what type of module it is connected to?
does that make sense? want to make sure i’m understanding the questions in the right context
I was asking that when think of the user experience. When they pair with a BLE module, will they have to pick what type of modules it is connected to or is that information provided?
I haven't seen what others have seen
oh what type of module the ble bit is connected to?
I should make that more clear
i’m not sure it knows! i think it’s just a voltage output based on the ble input if i understand correctly. but maybe it can detect
anyways tht question makes more sense :simple_smile:
thank you for clarifying the question
how are we feeling about the questions?
from my end, I think I may add that we don’t have enough info to scope the music app components yet, but could put some thoughts into some basic features or concepting
I agree, it is a bit vague without seeing it in person
Other than that, both Evans and Charles have given input on the questions
So if you think they make sense, then send it off
Cool. Just had a quick chat w/ them to add some music questions. I’ve created a duplicate doc in that folder (appended with the word “Shared”) that will go to client. Thanks for all the help!
